function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Challenges in face-to-face consultations during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of smartphone technology for covid-19 data and information updates","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of mobile apps for tracking covid-19 transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gps and bluetooth technology used for tracking covid-19 patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and storage of personal health and travel data","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Notification alert for vicinity near red zone based on user location","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through proximity contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and infodemic through social media","category":"Public Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and fact-checking in encrypted messaging platforms","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective contact tracing leading to virus transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-referencing user’s location with covid-19 patient location","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gps location tracking of positive patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring financial transactions, gps location, and cctv footage","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of personal data to all individuals in the area","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Live-location tracking of patients","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact tracing and sharing location history and contacts","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity tracking and real-time dashboard of covid-19 cases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of sensitive user information such as age, profession, medical history, and travel history for risk assessment.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sensitive user information between mobile devices during close contact.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation and false self-diagnosis through the app.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on the accuracy of user-provided information for contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unrequired self-isolation due to self-positives","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of medical care apps may lead to misdiagnosis or incorrect treatment due to lack of physical examination.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of disease spread through mobile apps leading to false positives and unnecessary self-isolation.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on educational apps for e-learning may result in decreased interaction and engagement, leading to reduced learning outcomes.","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on mobile technology for contact tracing and exposure monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in use of grocery apps and delivery services","category":"Shopping","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of gps technology to monitor and record interaction frequency between infected and non-infected persons.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring user movements and alerting them based on zonal presence green zone or red zone .","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wi-fi networks can be used for location tracing during the ongoing pandemic.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission risk of covid-19 through mobile applications","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through video conferencing and mhealth apps","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on mhealth for self-monitoring without professional medical guidance","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Great communication between the public and government for disease prevention","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advancements in mobile technology for precise positioning of hotspots and relief approaches","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of accurate individual health monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning may not fully address the complex needs of designing self-sufficient and healthy living spaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Loss of green spaces and interaction with nature due to overbuilding and high-density living.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to monitor public health and government announcements can result in non-compliance with regulations and guidelines, leading to increased risk of contagious disease propagation.","category":"Public Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of policies mandating employees to refrain from work when symptomatic or exposed to covid-19 can result in workplace transmission of the virus.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate support for workers in the event of a positive covid-19 case can result in fear, stigma, and reluctance to report symptoms, leading to underreporting of cases and increased risk of transmission.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining regular communication and coordination among project teams due to social distancing measures.","category":"Working","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive ranking of all identified actions and their impacts","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapidly changing covid-19 pandemic situation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on preliminary data for decision-making","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic effects on construction organizations","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survey data collection during the pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Specialization in industrial construction","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of specific response plan and guidelines for construction organizations to address covid-19 pandemic issues.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited information on actions and policies implemented or suggested by construction and nonconstruction organizations.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
